Welcome to FarmVision

Empowering Farmers, Enhancing Agriculture

Explore

About Us

Empowering Farmers, Transforming Markets

Digital Mandi is an innovative platform that bridges the gap between farmers and wholesalers. We offer a transparent and efficient marketplace for agricultural products, empowering farmers to get the best prices while ensuring wholesalers have access to fresh produce directly from the source.

Our mission is to revolutionize the agricultural market by leveraging technology to create a sustainable and profitable ecosystem for all stakeholders involved.

Our Offerings

Satellite Crop Health Monitoring

Real-time satellite-based crop health insights for better management.

Crop Classification & Planning

Precision crop classification for optimized agro-climatic planning.

Why Choose Us?

Crop Health Monitoring

Leverage satellite technology for real-time monitoring and analysis of crop health to make informed decisions.

AI-Based Monitoring

Advanced AI algorithms for field boundary detection, crop health monitoring, and yield estimation.

Agro Advisory Services

Expert advice and recommendations for optimal crop management and resource utilization.

Sustainable Practices

Promoting sustainability through soil moisture-based irrigation and efficient water resource management.

E-Marketplace Integration

Enhanced market access through integration with e-marketplaces for better trade opportunities.

Crop Classification & Planning

Precision crop classification and agro-climatic planning to maximize productivity and sustainability.
